summary: This is an email dated August 16, 2019, with the subject 'Past Supplements and Memos', containing attachments related to institutional procedures for detox, suicide prevention, and psychological observation. The document appears to be internal correspondence, possibly within a correctional or detention facility, sent shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death.

events.title: Institution Supplement Detox Issued
events.description: An institutional supplement regarding detox procedures was issued.

events.title: Institution Supplement Suicide Prevention Issued
events.description: An institutional supplement regarding suicide prevention procedures was issued.

events.title: Psychological Observation Procedural Memo Issued
events.description: A procedural memo regarding psychological observation was issued.

events.title: Email with Past Procedure Documents
events.description: An email was sent with attachments of past institutional supplements and memos related to detox, suicide prevention, and psychological observation.

keyFacts: The email was sent on August 16, 2019, which is shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
Attached documents include institutional procedures for detox (dated 2007), suicide prevention (dated 2013), and psychological observation (dated 2019).
The subject 'Past Supplements and Memos' suggests a review or sharing of historical institutional policies.
The document does not mention any specific individuals by name, only procedural documents.
The timing of the email suggests it may be related to post-incident review or information gathering following Epstein's death.
